Gertrude Cone

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Alice Jefferies
  3. Location of Family: Wayne, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wayne, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 10
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: female
